title: Bug 116786: Library include does not store relative path
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer does not generate and save the relative path correctly.
OB: Currently, when a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer saves an absolute path instead of a relative path.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path correctly when a library is included in a report design.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a report design in the directory $project/test
2. Include a library from the directory $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary
3. Save the report design
4. Open the report design again and check the path of the included library
5. Verify that the path is saved as a relative path instead of an absolute path
